A

A - Class in asteroid
Entry point to look up functions and utilities to work with nodes, expressions, statements, node utils...etc
A() - Constructor for class asteroid.A
 
A.PHASE_GLOBAL - Enum in asteroid
Compilation phases available for global transformations:

SEMANTIC_ANALYSIS CANONICALIZATION INSTRUCTION_SELECTION CLASS_GENERATION OUTPUT FINALIZATION
A.PHASE_LOCAL - Enum in asteroid
Compilation phases available for local transformations.
A.TO - Enum in asteroid
Targets available to apply a specific transformation

AppliedOnceTo<T extends org.codehaus.groovy.ast.AnnotatedNode> - Class in asteroid.check
This checker makes sure a given AnnotationNode has only be applied once to a given set of nodes of a given type.
appliedOnceTo(List<T>) - Static method in class asteroid.check.AppliedOnceTo
Creates a checker of type AppliedOnceTo with the set of nodes a given annotation could have been applied to
Apply - Annotation Type in asteroid.local
Represents the possible type of A.TO the transformation can be applied to
asteroid - package asteroid
This package contains:
Classes to implement a local AST transformation Classes to access builder to create: nodes, expressions, statements Classes to make it easier to access AST node values Classes to check AST nodes Most of the times you can access all these functionalities through the A class
asteroid.check - package asteroid.check
This package contains to check the state of ASTNode instances
asteroid.global - package asteroid.global
 
asteroid.internal - package asteroid.internal
Internal use: This package contains AST transformations to get rid of boilerplate code when creating a local AST transformation.
asteroid.local - package asteroid.local
 
asteroid.nodes - package asteroid.nodes
This package contains classes to build ASTNode instances

getTransformers() - Method in class asteroid.global.GlobalTransformationImpl

GlobalTransformation - Annotation Type in asteroid.global
Can be used when declaring an implementation of LocalTransformationImpl to reduce the boilerplate code needed:

No need to provide GroovyASTTransformation Limits the compilation phases to avoid using a non allowed phase
GlobalTransformationImpl - Class in asteroid.global
This class applies all transformers provided by the method getTransformers in order to all class nodes present in a given source unit instance.
GlobalTransformationImpl() - Constructor for class asteroid.global.GlobalTransformationImpl

LocalTransformation - Annotation Type in asteroid.local
Can be used when declaring an implementation of LocalTransformationImpl to reduce the boilerplate code needed:

t No need to implement constructor () No need to provide GroovyASTTransformation Limits the compilation phases to avoid using a non allowed phase

This class is an abstraction to process certain nodes annotated with a specific annotation node type

R

Result - Class in asteroid.check
When a given Checker is processed through its Checker.accepts(ASTNode) method it will return a result containing whether the cheker failed or it passed, and the correspondent message to inform what was the problem.
